s0377: requested to die by suicide in the temple, not permitted.
s0378: All said: 'Your servant Zhu is ill, cannot listen to commands.
s0380: Attendant ministers rush to those with lewdness, do not know two commands.'
s0381: Duke climbed wall, shot hit duke's thigh, duke fell back, then assassinated him.
s0382: Yan Ying stood at Cui Zhu's gate, said: 'If lord dies for the altars of soil and grain then die for it, if flees for the altars of soil and grain then flee for it.
s0383: If dies for oneself or flees for oneself, not being privately intimate, who dares undertake it!'
s0384: Gate opened and entered, pillowed the duke's corpse and wept, three times leaped out.
s0385: People told Cui Zhu: 'Must kill him.'
s0386: Cui Zhu said: 'The people's hope, release him to gain the people.'
s0388: Ding chou day, Cui Zhu established Duke Zhuang's different mother younger brother Chu Jiu, this was Duke Jing.
s0389: Duke Jing's mother was the daughter of Shu Sun Xuan Bo of Lu.
s0390: Duke Jing established, made Cui Zhu right chancellor, Qing Feng left chancellor.
s0391: Two chancellors feared disorder would arise, then allied with the state people saying: 'Those not with Cui Qing die!'
s0392: Yan Zi gazed heavenward saying: 'Ying follows only those loyal to lord and beneficial to altars of soil and grain!'
s0394: Qing Feng wished to kill Yan Zi, Cui Zhu said: 'Loyal minister, release him.'
s0395: Qi grand historian wrote 'Cui Zhu assassinated Duke Zhuang', Cui Zhu killed him.
s0396: His younger brother again wrote, Cui Zhu again killed him.
s0397: Youngest younger brother again wrote, Cui Zhu then released him.
s0398: Duke Jing year 1, initially, Cui Zhu gave birth to Zi Cheng and Qiang, his mother died, took Dong Guo woman, gave birth to Ming.
s0399: Dong Guo woman made her former husband Zi Wu Jiu and her younger brother Yan mutually support Cui clan.
s0400: Cheng had crime, two chancellors urgently punished him, established Ming as crown prince.
s0401: Cheng requested to retire in Cui, Cui Zhu permitted it, two chancellors did not listen, said: 'Cui is ancestral city, cannot.'
s0402: Cheng and Qiang angered, told Qing Feng.
s0403: Qing Feng had enmity with Cui Zhu, wished his defeat.
s0404: Cheng and Qiang killed Wu Jiu and Yan in Cui Zhu's house, household all fled and scattered.
s0405: Cui Zhu angered, had no people, made one eunuch drive, saw Qing Feng.
s0406: Qing Feng said: 'Please for you execute them.'
s0407: Made Cui Zhu's enemy Lu Pu Bi attack Cui clan, killed Cheng and Qiang, completely extinguished Cui clan, Cui Zhu's wife committed suicide.
s0408: Cui Zhu had no return, also committed suicide.
s0409: Qing Feng became chancellor, monopolized power.
s0410: Year 3 tenth month, Qing Feng went hunting.
s0411: Initially, Qing Feng having killed Cui Zhu, became increasingly arrogant, addicted to wine and fond of hunting, did not listen to government commands.
s0412: Qing She used government, already had internal enmity.
s0413: Tian Wen Zi told Jian Zi: 'Disorder will arise.'
s0414: Tian, Bao, Gao, Luan clans mutually plotted against Qing clan.
s0415: Qing She mobilized armor surrounding Qing Feng's palace, four families' followers together attacked and broke it.
s0416: Qing Feng returned, could not enter, fled to Lu.
s0417: Qi people rebuked Lu, Feng fled to Wu.
s0418: Wu gave him Zhu Fang, gathered his clan and dwelt there, richer than in Qi.
s0419: That autumn, Qi people moved and buried Duke Zhuang, mutilated Cui Zhu's corpse in the market to please the masses.
s0420: Year 9, Duke Jing sent Yan Ying to Jin, privately spoke with Shu Xiang saying: 'Qi governance finally returns to Tian clan.
s0421: Tian clan though without great virtue, with public power for private use, has virtue for the people, people love them.'
s0422: Year 12, duke went to Jin, saw Duke Ping, wished to attack Yan together.
s0423: Year 18, duke again went to Jin, saw Duke Zhao.
s0424: Year 26, hunted in Lu suburbs, thus entered Lu, with Yan Ying together inquired of Lu rites.
s0425: Year 31, Duke Zhao of Lu avoided Ji clan difficulty, fled to Qi.
s0426: Qi wished to seal him with thousand settlements, Zi Jia stopped Duke Zhao, Duke Zhao then requested Qi attack Lu, take Yun to house Duke Zhao.
